doc.sitename: EIKE - Europäisches Institut für Klima & Energie
doc.title: 13th International Climate Conference of EIKE in Munich: Live Broadcast On The Internet
doc.author: Burkhard
doc.excerpt: by AR Göhring Dear supporters and readers, the EIKE team would like to thank you all for your moral and financial support, which we did not expect in this comprehensive form after the cancellation of the NH Hotel!

main.p: Since many interested people had not booked or canceled their trip to our conference in Munich because of the uncertain situation, we organized a professional live stream. You can access the talks of our speakers at YouTube tomorrow; the link will be created and published on this site. It starts on Friday at 10 A.M. local time (GMT +1) with the welcome by EIKE President Dr. Holger Thuss.
The complete program can be viewed here.
